/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/:
The image captures a serene street scene in Beijing, China. The viewer's perspective is that of a pedestrian standing on the sidewalk, looking down the length of the street. The street itself is lined with trees on both sides, their leaves a vibrant green against the backdrop of a clear blue sky. The sun shines brightly, casting a warm glow over the scene and creating a lens flare in the top right corner of the image.

On the right side of the street, there's a brick building, its red-brown hues adding a touch of rustic charm to the scene. On the left side, a fence runs parallel to the sidewalk, beyond which lies a grassy area dotted with bushes and trees, adding a touch of nature to the urban setting.

The image is taken from a low angle, which gives a sense of depth and perspective, drawing the viewer's eye down the length of the street. The composition of the image, with its blend of urban and natural elements, paints a picture of a peaceful day in a city where nature and architecture coexist harmoniously.
